org.sm.fraxion.gui.filters

Class AFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sm.fraxion.gui.filters.AFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlurFilter, EdgeFilter, IdentityFilter, InvertFilter, PosteriseFilter, SharpenFilter

    public abstract class AFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    The AFilter class provides the functionality specification for filtering a fractal's image buffer.
    Version:
    20/04/2016
    Author:
    Sven Maerivoet
